name.baseName: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site ; Soil Risk Control ; Vertical Barrier ; Cement slurry barrier
运输到场的设备和材料;土壤风险管控;垂直阻隔;水泥注浆墙

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Transport limestone, concrete, sand, and gypsum materials required for the construction of a cement grout vertical barrier to the site.
将水泥浆垂直阻隔施工所需的石灰石、混凝土、沙子和石膏材料运输至现场。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: For this project, a Superfund location at the Brookhaven National Laboratory (BNL) is studied. This particular case was chosen because it is representative of the scale and scenario where soil grouting would be used. It is also one of only a few sites where CS grouting has been used for full scale remediation. BNL has served as a production facility for research and development of radioisotopes for decades. The design of some of the facilities failed to provide adequate safety measures against the spread of radioactivity to the soils and groundwater beneath them and as a result, BNL was added to the Superfund National Priorities List in 1989.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process involves the transportation of materials such as limestone, concrete, sand, and gypsum to the construction site to create a cement grout vertical barrier. This process is primarily used for soil risk control in environmental remediation projects, specifically at locations like the Superfund site at Brookhaven National Laboratory (BNL), where soil grouting is employed to prevent the spread of contaminants from historic activities.
该工业流程涉及将石灰石、混凝土、沙子和石膏等材料运输到施工现场，以创建水泥浆垂直阻隔。这一过程主要用于环境修复项目中的土壤风险管控，特别是在布鲁克黑文国家实验室（BNL）之类的超级基金场地，那里采用土壤灌浆技术防止历史活动中污染物的扩散。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Gallagher, P. M., Spatari, S. & Cucura, J. Hybrid life cycle assessment comparison of colloidal silica and cement grouted soil barrier remediation technologies. Journal of Hazardous Materials 250–251, 421–430 (2013).

Gallagher, P. M., Spatari, S. & Cucura, J. Hybrid life cycle assessment comparison of colloidal silica and cement grouted soil barrier remediation technologies. Journal of Hazardous Materials 250–251, 421–430 (2013).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this dataset, users must consider the specific context of environmental remediation at a Superfund site. Attention should be given to the methodological adjustments required for accounting for the transport of materials and the construction of the vertical barriers, including the impacts of site-specific factors such as local regulations, transport distances, and emissions. Furthermore, it is crucial to integrate this data within a broader LCA framework considering the complete lifecycle of environmental remediation projects, from planning through to execution and long-term maintenance.
使用此数据集时，用户必须考虑在超级基金场地进行环境修复的具体背景。应注意材料运输和垂直阻隔建设所需的方法学调整，包括当地法规、运输距离和排放等场地特定因素的影响。此外，在将这些数据整合入更广泛的生命周期评估框架中时，考虑环境修复项目从规划到执行和长期维护的完整生命周期至关重要。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site

exchange.generalComment: 运输到场的相关材料（石灰石、混凝土、黏土和石膏）
